TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField

summary.span: 表示将显示为数据绑定控件中的图像的字段。

span.span: Represents a field that is displayed as an image in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由数据绑定控件 (如和) 可显示每个记录显示图像。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display an image for each record displayed. 具体取决于使用它的数据绑定控件以不同方式显示对象。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控件显示对象作为某一列，而控件将其显示为一行。For example, the control displays an object as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 若要显示的图像，必须将绑定的字段中包含的图像的 URL 的数据源的对象。To display images, you must bind an object to a field from a data source that contains the URL of an image. 这通过设置实现属性。This is accomplished by setting the property. 可以使用格式化的 URL 值属性。The URL value can be formatted by using the property. 每个映像还可以与之关联的替换文字。Each image can also have alternate text associated with it. 映像不能加载，或不可用时显示此文本。This text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded, or is unavailable. 支持工具提示功能的浏览器还将此文本显示为工具提示。Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip. 可以使用以下方法之一来指定显示的图像的替换文字：You can specify the alternate text for a displayed image by using one of the following methods: - 使用属性来指定适用于所有图像的替换文字。Use the property to specify alternate text that applies to all images. - 使用属性将绑定到数据源中的字段的每个映像的属性。Use the property to bind a field from a data source to the property of each image. 这可以具有不同显示每个图像的替换文字。This allows you to have different alternate text for each image displayed. 绑定数据时，或者可以通过使用格式的替换文字属性。When binding data, you can optionally format the alternate text by using the property. 当图像的 URL 值是`null`，无法显示图像。When the URL value for an image is `null`, an image cannot be displayed. 可以显示的备用图像`null`通过设置字段值属性。You can display an alternate image for `null` field values by setting the property. 而不是一个备用的映像，可以通过设置显示备用文本属性。Instead of an alternate image, you can display alternate text by setting the property. 默认情况下，数据绑定控件中显示声明的所有字段。By default, all declared fields are displayed in a data-bound control. 您可以隐藏通过设置数据绑定控件中的对象属性设置为`false`。You can hide an object in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 你可以自定义的标头和表尾部分对象。You can customize the header and footer sections of an object. 若要在页眉或页脚部分显示标题，请设置或属性，分别。To display a caption in the header or footer section, set the or properties, respectively. 若要显示图像而不是文本的页眉节中，设置属性。To display an image in the header section instead of text, set the property. 标头部分可以隐藏在通过设置对象属性设置为`false`。The header section can be hidden in the object by setting the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 一些数据绑定控件 (如控件) 可以显示或隐藏控件的整个标头部分。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 不支持这些数据绑定控件为单个数据绑定字段的属性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual data-bound field. 若要显示或隐藏数据绑定控件的整个标头部分，使用控件的`ShowHeader`属性 （如果可用）。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control, use the control's `ShowHeader` property (if available). 你还可以自定义外观通过设置该字段的不同部分的样式属性的对象 （字体颜色、 背景色等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出了不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |样式属性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||子 Web 服务器控件的样式设置对象。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||脚注部分的样式设置对象。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||标头部分的样式设置对象。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||中的数据项的样式设置对象。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象中控件来显示图像。The following example demonstrates how to use an object in a control to display an image. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/CS/ImageFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/VB/ImageFieldvb.aspx#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 将字段添加到动态创建的数据绑定控件时，通常使用此构造函数。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要动态添加对象传递给数据绑定控件，创建一个新对象，设置其属性，并将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。To dynamically add an object to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果使用的控件中，添加对象传递给集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 尽管您可以向数据绑定控件动态添加字段，但强烈建议，字段是静态声明，然后显示或隐藏，根据需要。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明所有字段会减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数将动态添加对象传递给的集合控件。The following example demonstrates how to use this constructor to dynamically add an object to the collection of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldCtor/CS/ImageFieldCtorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldCtor/VB/ImageFieldCtorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string AlternateText { get; set; }
.property instance string AlternateText
Public Overridable Property AlternateText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ AlternateText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AlternateText : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为 对象中的图像显示的备用文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed for an image in the object.

value.span: 显示在 对象中的图像的备用文本。

span.span: The alternate text for an image displayed in the object.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定在显示的图像的替换文字对象。Use the property to specify the alternate text for the images displayed in an object. 图像不能加载或不可用时，将显示的替换文字。The alternate text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded or is unavailable. 支持工具提示功能的浏览器还将此文本显示为工具提示。Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip. > [!NOTE] > 当设置此属性，在显示的所有图像对象共享相同的备用文本。When this property is set, all images displayed in an object share the same alternate text. 或者，您可以将绑定的替换文字到数据源中的字段通过设置而不是此属性的属性。As an alternative, you can bind the alternate text to a field in a data source by setting the property instead of this property. 这可以具有不同显示每个图像的替换文字。This allows you to have different alternate text for each image displayed. 如果这两个并设置的属性，属性优先。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定中显示的所有图像的替换文字对象。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text for all images displayed in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/CS/ImageFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/VB/ImageFieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示在从数据源返回字段值时，空字符串 ("") 值是否转换为 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty string ("") values are converted to when the field values are returned from the data source.

value.span: 如果 值应当转换为 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if values should be converted to ; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时用户可能会为字段值更新或插入记录时输入空字符串。Sometimes the user may enter an empty string for a field value when updating or inserting records. 使用属性指定是否为空字符串值自动转换为`null`时数据源中更新数据字段Use the property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to `null` when the data field is updated in the data source > [!NOTE] > 类显示`null`作为默认情况下为空字符串。The class displays `null` as empty strings by default. 若要显示不同的值，请设置属性。To display a different value, set the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源中某个字段的名称，该字段包含的值要绑定到 对象中每个图像的 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object.

value.span: 要绑定 对象中每个图像的 属性的字段名称。

span.span: The name of the field to bind the property of each image in an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的名称字段从数据源包含要绑定到的值属性中每个图像对象。Use the property to specify the name of the filed from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object. 启用可具有不同备用显示每个图像的文本。The enables you to have different alternate text for each image displayed. 图像不能加载或不可用时，将显示的替换文字。The alternate text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded or is unavailable. 支持工具提示功能的浏览器还将此文本显示为工具提示。Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip. > [!NOTE] > 您可以通过设置适用于所有图像的替换文字而不是此属性的属性。You can specify alternate text that applies to all images by setting the property instead of this property. 如果这两个并设置的属性，字段将优先。If both the and properties are set, the field takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定源数据中的字段的名称，包含要绑定到的值属性中每个图像对象。The following example code demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/CS/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/VB/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldvb.aspx#1)]

.property instance string DataAlternateTextFormatString

public: virtual property System::String ^ DataAlternateTextFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataAlternateTextFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串指定 对象中每个图像的备用文本所呈现的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 指定 对象中每个图像的备用文本所呈现的格式的字符串。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，它指示备用文本现在应用特殊格式。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that now special formatting is applied to the alternate text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定在显示的图像的替换文字值的自定义格式对象。Use the property to specify a custom format for the alternate text values of the images displayed in an object. > [!NOTE] > 应用格式字符串，则仅当属性设置。The format string is applied only when the property is set. 它不是应用时属性设置。It is not applied when the property is set. 当您需要修改字段中包含的原始值时，这很有用。This is useful when you need to modify the original value contained in the field. 如果属性未设置，备用文本值不会获得任何特殊格式设置。If the property is not set, the alternate text values do not get any special formatting. 格式字符串可以是任何文本字符串，并且通常包含字段的值的占位符。The format string can be any literal string and usually contains a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式字符串中"项值： {0}"，"{0}"使用指定的字段的值替换占位符属性。For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the "{0}" placeholder is replaced with the value of the fields specified by the property. 格式字符串的其余部分将显示为文字文本。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字符串不包含一个占位符，从数据源的字段的值不包含在最终的显示文本。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. 占位符由冒号分隔的两个部分组成 (":") 和包装在大括号 ("{}")，在窗体`{A:Bxx}`。The placeholder consists of two parts separated by a colon (":") and wrapped in braces ("{}"), in the form `{A:Bxx}`. 冒号前的值 (`A`常规示例中) 指定的参数的从零开始的列表中的字段值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此参数是格式化语法的一部分。This parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 由于每个单元中只有一个字段值，此值只能设置为 0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒号和冒号后面的值是可选的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定要在其中显示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出了常见的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科学记数法 （指数） 格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|以固定格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|一般情况下设置显示数值的格式。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|采用数字格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，除`X`，它在指定的情况下显示的十六进制字符。The format characters are not case sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字符 (xx 常规示例中) 后的值指定有效位数或小数位数来显示的数字。The value after the format character (xx in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，格式字符串"{0:F2}"显示带 2 位小数的定点数。For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with 2 decimal places. 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性应用到中的图像的替换文字值的自定义格式对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to apply a custom format to the alternate text values for the images in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/CS/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldAlternateTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldAlternateTextField/VB/ImageFieldAlternateTextFieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源中某个字段的名称，该字段包含的值要绑定到 对象中每个图像的 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the property of each image in an object.

value.span: 要绑定到 对象中每个图像的 属性的字段名称。

span.span: The name of the field to bind to the property of each image in an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要绑定到字段的名称属性中每个图像对象。Use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of each image in an object. 指定的字段必须包含的图像的 Url 中显示对象。The specified field must contain the URLs for the images to display in the object. 您可以根据需要设置的 URL 值格式通过设置属性。You can optionally format the URL values by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 当字段的值是`null`，无法显示图像。When the filed value is `null`, an image cannot be displayed. 可以显示的备用图像`null`通过设置字段值属性。You can display an alternate image for `null` field values by setting the property. 而不是一个备用的映像，可以通过设置显示备用文本属性。Instead of an alternate image, you can display alternate text by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要绑定到字段的名称属性中每个图像对象。The following example code demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of each image in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/CS/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/VB/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，用于指定 对象中每个图像的 URL 所呈现的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the URL for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 一个字符串，用于指定 对象中每个图像的 URL 所呈现的格式。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the URL for each image in an object is rendered.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，它指示 URL 未应用任何特殊格式。

span.span: The default is the empty string ("") , which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the URLs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性中显示的图像的 url 中指定自定义格式对象。Use the property to specify a custom format for the URLs of the images displayed in an object. 这在时需要生成一个 URL，例如何时有用对象只包含的文件的名称。This is useful when you need to generate a URL, such as when the object simply contains the file name. 如果属性未设置，则 URL 值不会获得任何特殊格式设置。If the property is not set, the URL values do not get any special formatting. 格式字符串可以是任何文本字符串，并且通常包含字段的值的占位符。The format string can be any literal string and usually contains a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式字符串中"项值： {0}"，"{0}"使用指定的字段的值替换占位符属性。For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the "{0}" placeholder is replaced with the value of the fields specified by the property. 格式字符串的其余部分将显示为文字文本。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字符串不包含一个占位符，从数据源的字段的值不包含在最终的显示文本。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. 占位符由冒号分隔的两个部分组成 (":") 和包装在大括号 ("{}")，在窗体`{A:Bxx}`。The placeholder consists of two parts separated by a colon (":") and wrapped in braces ("{}"), in the form `{A:Bxx}`. 冒号前的值 (`A`常规示例中) 指定的参数的从零开始的列表中的字段值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此参数是格式化语法的一部分。This parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 由于每个单元中只有一个字段值，此值只能设置为 0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒号和冒号后面的值是可选的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定要在其中显示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出了常见的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科学记数法 （指数） 格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|以固定格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|一般情况下设置显示数值的格式。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|采用数字格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，除`X`，它在指定的情况下显示的十六进制字符。The format characters are not case sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字符 (xx 常规示例中) 后的值指定有效位数或小数位数来显示的数字。The value after the format character (xx in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，格式字符串"{0:F2}"显示带 2 位小数的定点数。For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with 2 decimal places. 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将自定义格式应用到的 URL 值中的图像的对象。The following example code demonstrates how to use the property to apply a custom format to the URL values for the images in an object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/CS/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatString/VB/ImageFieldImageUrlFormatStringvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用的数据控件与其对象所关联来执行基本的对象初始化的字段，该字段添加到字段集合之前的实例。The method is called by the data control with which the object is associated to perform basic object initialization for instances of the field, before the field is ever added to a field collection. 数据控件，如并调用中的方法及其`CreateChildControls`等其他方法之前的方法`CreateRow`调用以创建包含数据的特定行。Data controls such as and call the method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before other methods such as `CreateRow` are called to create specific rows with data. 此方法时要编写自定义数据绑定控件调用使用对象执行基本初始化对象。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to perform basic initialization for an object. 如果实现此方法在的派生的类型需要的任何对象初始化之前它将填充对象的数据，或在控件中方法。Implement this method if your -derived type requires any object initialization before it populates objects with data or controls in the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置当 属性所指定的字段值为 时，将要显示在 对象中的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display in an object when the value of the field specified by the property is .

value.span: 字段值为 时要显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display when the value of a field is .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定字段的值属性是`null`，图像不能显示在对象。When the value of the field specified by the property is `null`, an image cannot be displayed in an object. 使用属性来指定要在图像的位置显示的文本。Use the property to specify the text to display in the image's place. 文本通常表示正常的图像不可用或找不到。The text usually indicates that the normal image is not available or cannot be found. > [!NOTE] > 或者，您可以显示的备用图像的字段值时`null`通过设置而不是此属性的属性。As an alternative, you can display an alternate image when the field value is `null` by setting the property instead of this property. 如果并属性均设置，属性具有的优先级。If the and properties are both set, the property has precedence. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定要显示由指定的字段的值的文本属性是`null`。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text to display when the value of the field specified by the property is `null`. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/CS/ImageFieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageField/VB/ImageFieldvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定字段的值属性是`null`，图像不能显示在对象。When the value of the field specified by the property is `null`, an image cannot be displayed in an object. 使用属性来指定要显示的备用图像的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to an alternate image to display. 备用映像通常是图像，指示正常图像不可用或找不到。The alternate image is usually an image that indicates that the normal image is not available or cannot be found. > [!NOTE] > 或者，可以只是显示的文本字段值时`null`通过设置而不是此属性的属性。As an alternative, you can simply display text when the field value is `null` by setting the property instead of this property. 如果并属性均设置，属性具有的优先级。If the and properties are both set, the property has precedence. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定的备用图像的 URL，通过指定字段的值时要显示属性是`null`。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the URL to an alternate image to display when the value of the field specified by the property is `null`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，由指定的字段的值数据绑定控件处于编辑模式时，可以由用户修改属性。By default, the values of the field specified by the property can be modified by the user when a data-bound control is in edit mode. 若要防止用户更改字段的值，请将此属性设置为`true`。To prevent the user from changing the values of the field, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在中对象，属性通常包含的包含对象中所显示图像的 Url 的字段名称。In an object, the property usually contains the name of the field that contains the URLs to the images displayed in the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以指示的字段值表示在显示的图像 Url在编辑模式下无法修改对象。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the field values that represent the URLs to the images displayed in an object cannot be modified in edit mode. summary.span: 确定 对象中所包含的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in an object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用来确定控件是否包含在一个帮助器方法对象支持回调。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in an object support callbacks. 此方法已作为空方法 （不包含任何代码的方法） 以指示支持回调实现。This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

span.para: 派生的类类可以重写此方法，以指示是否通过字段支持回调所包含的控件。若要指示支持回调，实现此方法作为空方法，不会引发异常;否则，使用有用的消息说明为什么不支持回调引发异常。

Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks. To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
